ca.ualberta.cmput301.t03.inventory

Class AddItemController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cmput301.t03.inventory.AddItemController

  • public class AddItemController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controls adding an item to user's inventory. Has view AddItemView and the user's Inventory as its model.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AddItemController(View v, Activity activity, Inventory inventory)
      Default constructor for AddItemController.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      On-click listener for the Add button.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • AddItemController

        public AddItemController(View v,
                         Activity activity,
                         Inventory inventory)
        Default constructor for AddItemController. Used to initialize an instance of the AddItemController from a relevant View on an instance of the Inventory model.
        Parameters:
        v - The AddItemView attached to this controller
        activity - Used to close the AddItemView (activity) when item is successfully added to inventory
        inventory - The model that will be updated once item is successfully added.

    • Method Detail

      • addItemToInventory

        public void addItemToInventory()
        On-click listener for the Add button. This function grabs values from the AddItem fields and stores them in a private item model. It successfully adds an item to inventory if the fields are valid, and closes the activity.

      • checkFieldsValid

        public boolean checkFieldsValid()
        Checks if item's fields are valid. Required fields include the item name and category. Only the length of the name (>0) is checked. The Spinner listener sets the item's category and that is also checked. More validity checks can be added.
        Returns:
        true if fields are valid; else false.
